name: World Racing
author: KesieV
description:
Despite most of the pages of the Wright! Magazine depicts me as a frustrated sport-hater, I always had a catch for racing games, from the great Pitstop II (1984), the top-down racers around the 90's and the modern arcades, like Ridge Racer and its fourth excellent chapter (1998).

So why not including a classic to my collection, test how I can check laps and position on a circuit using Wright! and bring tons of nostalgia?

Plot!

You're the legendary driver of the Aquamarine car, challenging the Red Team for the first place on the World Racing Championship! Use LEFT/RIGHT for steering left or right and A BUTTON for accelerating. And I don't like racing as a real sport. Obviously.
